description: This header file declares functions and includes necessary dependencies for managing a restore operation within a service configuration system. It provides interfaces to check if a restore is running, to start a restore process with a list of steps, and to notify the system when a service has completed its restore callback.

methods.name: isRestoreRunning
methods.description: Checks if a restore operation is currently in progress, used to prevent conflicts such as concurrent backups.

methods.name: startRestoreProcess
methods.description: Initiates the restore process, populating a list of steps to perform, and eventually triggers a service restart upon success.

methods.name: notifyRestoreCallback
methods.description: Notifies the system that a particular service has finished its restore or RMA process, providing the service name and status.
